Account - Interface in it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.model
This interface extends the interface HasID and is implemented by all the classes that have the responsibility to manage an account.
AccountType - Enum in it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.model
This enumeration defines the two types an Account can be: an ASSET or a LIABILITY.
